advisor.name: Manual mappings
advisor.description: Assign project coordinates based on a mapping performed manually in the Project Coordinates view. (All dependencies)

advisor.name: Shared manual mappings (experimental)
advisor.description: Assign project coordinates based on a manual-mappings file shared through the model repository. (All dependencies)

advisor.name: Apache Maven pom.properties
advisor.description: Assign project coordinates based on a pom.properties file. This file is part of many JARs build with Apache Maven or similar tools. (JAR files only)

advisor.name: Apache Maven pom.xml
advisor.description: Assign project coordinates based on a pom.xml file. This file is part of all projects build with Apache Maven. (Workspace projects only)

advisor.name: JRE Execution Environment
advisor.description: Assign project coordinates based on the Execution Environment that Eclipse associates with the JRE. (JRE only)

advisor.name: JRE release file
advisor.description: Assign project coordinates based on the release file shipped with most Java Runtime Environments. (JRE only)

advisor.name: JRE directory name
advisor.description: Assign project coordinates based on name of the Java Runtime Environment’s home directory. (JRE only)

advisor.name: OSGi Bundle-SymbolicName (Model repository)
advisor.description: Assign project coordinates based on a dependency’s SHA-1 fingerprint. The fingerprint is searched for in all registered model repositories. (Workspace projects and JAR files)

advisor.name: SHA-1 Fingerprint (Model repository)
advisor.description: Assign project coordinates based on a dependency’s SHA-1 fingerprint. The fingerprint is searched for in all registered model repositories. (JAR files only)

advisor.name: OSGi MANIFEST.MF
advisor.description: Assign project coordinates based on an OSGi MANIFEST.MF. The coordinate is derived from the Bundle-SymbolicName and Bundle-Version headers found therein. (Workspace projects and JAR files)

advisor.name: SHA-1 Fingerrint (Maven Central)
advisor.description: Assign project coordinates based on a dependency’s SHA-1 fingerprint. The fingerprint is searched for in the Maven Central repository. Note: This advisor performs a HTTP request. (JAR files only)
